meanings.definition: The act of assisting in piloting an aircraft alongside the main pilot.
meanings.sent1: During the flight, the copiloting helped the main pilot navigate through the storm.
meanings.sent2: The copiloting was crucial in ensuring a safe landing of the aircraft.
meanings.sent3: The copiloting duo shared a laugh as they steered the plane smoothly.
meanings.sent4: Their copiloting resembled a synchronized dance in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The copiloting role requires clear communication and quick decision-making.

meanings.definition: The practice of working together as a team to operate a vehicle or vessel.
meanings.sent1: The copiloting of the crew members on the ship ensured a smooth voyage.
meanings.sent2: Effective copiloting is essential for the success of any joint vehicle operation.
meanings.sent3: The copiloting team celebrated their successful navigation with high-fives.
meanings.sent4: Their copiloting was like a well-oiled machine, smoothly steering the vessel.
meanings.sent5: The copiloting partnership was built on trust and coordination.
